name: Players' Careers in 60 Seconds
description: One-minute, punchy career arcs of footballers — from debut to legacy.
overall_arc: A library of iconic and underrated football careers presented in a consistent high-tempo format.

name: Transfer Fee Timeline
description: Every transfer of a star footballer, adjusted for inflation, visualized chronologically.
overall_arc: Expose how market value evolved over a player's career and across eras.

name: Ballon d'Or Snubs
description: Year-by-year mini-cases on players who should've (or could've) won the Ballon d'Or.
overall_arc: Reassessing football’s biggest individual award through stats, context, and narratives.

name: Historical Events On This Day
description: Short, digestible summaries of significant historical events tied to today's date.
overall_arc: Make history feel fresh and relevant, one day at a time.

name: What Trended on Google This Day Last Year
description: A rapid snapshot of last year's hottest searches for today's date.
overall_arc: Track cultural memory and shifting attention across time.

name: Celebrity Birthdays Today
description: Quick bios and career highlights of celebrities born on today’s date.
overall_arc: Daily evergreen content that spotlights notable figures across fields.

name: Actors' Careers in 60 Seconds
description: From debut to blockbuster: an actor’s career summarized in one minute.
overall_arc: A fast, repeatable format that spans newcomers to icons.

name: Actor Connection Chains
description: Link two random actors through a chain of shared films and collaborators.
overall_arc: Showcase the hidden graph of Hollywood via playful, surprising chains.

name: Before They Were Famous
description: Spotlight actors' earliest roles and how they broke through.
overall_arc: Reveal the grind, luck, and milestones that led to stardom.
